about_the_game:
Spaceforge

You are a lone explorer, marooned on a mysterious alien planet teeming with strange flora, deadly fauna, and untold secrets. Your mission? Survive, adapt, and dominate. Gather resources, build shelters, automate essential tasks, and uncover the hidden wonders and threats of this unfamiliar world.

Features

🌍 A Vast Alien Landscape to Explore
Journey through stunning alien biomes, from lush forests filled with bizarre plant life to desolate volcanic fields that bubble with strange minerals. Every zone is rich with resources—but tread carefully. New areas bring new dangers!

⛏️ Gather, Craft, and Build
Start with the basics: gather rocks, minerals, and organic matter to forge your first tools and shelter. Over time, evolve your base into a fully automated outpost complete with resource processors, defensive systems, and more. Design structures to withstand extreme weather, relentless predators, and whatever else this alien world has in store.

🤖 Automate to Survive
Survival is a full-time job—until you’ve automated it. Build drones, conveyor systems, and advanced machinery to handle the repetitive tasks of gathering and processing resources, so you can focus on exploration and expansion. Adapt your base to operate even under the harshest planetary conditions.

🌌 Discover the Secrets of an Ancient Civilization
As you dig deeper into the planet, you’ll uncover the remnants of a lost civilization. Find and piece together alien artifacts, learn from mysterious hieroglyphs, and maybe even unlock powerful new technologies that could be the key to your survival—or your doom.

⚔️ Survive Fierce Alien Wildlife
From agile predators that stalk through the forests to massive behemoths that patrol the plains, survival on this planet isn’t just about gathering resources. Upgrade your gear, set traps, and outsmart hostile wildlife to stay alive. The planet’s creatures are highly adaptive, learning and responding to your tactics—so prepare to be tested!

🌠 Evolving Challenges
Seasons change, resources dwindle, and new threats emerge as you progress. Each day brings new challenges that force you to stay one step ahead. Will you master this world, or will it master you?

Are You Ready to Survive?

Every choice counts. Will you merely survive...or will you thrive?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 750ti or higher with 2GB Memory
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 3GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 or higher with 2GB Memory
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Stranded on a hostile alien world, you must gather resources, craft tools, and automate production to survive. Build a base, fend off deadly wildlife, and uncover ancient secrets in this immersive sci-fi survival adventure. Will you conquer the planet or succumb to its perils?
